column4: I have a live Linux cd + virusscanner software - i use to scan friends windows machines. :)
or course is a 'virus' that exploits a specific version of bind, on only one disrto, really  somthing to worry about. :)  thats what most of those on that list seem tobe.
most of the malware on that list is Proof of Concept stuff
yea. I noticed that wiki page needs work.. they should list what/how the virus is exploiting..   most all i researched are either really old or very specific.. or both..
